title: AppLovin Legal Scrutiny Tests AI Adtech Expansion Beyond Gaming
description: Short seller CapitalWatch accuses AppLovin (NasdaqGS:APP) of money laundering, which the company strongly denies. Law firm Pomerantz LLP is investigating potential securities fraud related to AppLovin. AppLovin has issued a cease and desist letter in response to the short seller allegations. The company has divested its gaming operations while expanding its AI powered adtech platform into e commerce, fintech, and automotive. AppLovin, listed on NasdaqGS:APP, runs an AI driven advertising...

title: MultiSensor AI Holdings, Inc. (NASDAQ:MSAI) Sees Significant Decrease in Short Interest
description: MultiSensor AI Holdings, Inc. (NASDAQ:MSAI – Get Free Report) was the recipient of a significant drop in short interest in January. As of January 15th, there was short interest totaling 1,409,479 shares, a drop of 57.5% from the December 31st total of 3,314,892 shares. Based on an average trading volume of 2,737,236 shares, the days-to-cover [...]

title: Why Lantronix (LTRX) Is Up 5.2% After New Qualcomm-Powered Defense Drone AI Deal - And What's Next
description: Lantronix Inc. and Safe Pro Group recently signed a Memorandum of Understanding and Master Services Agreement to jointly develop Qualcomm-based, AI-powered edge compute solutions that enable real-time, on-device threat detection for drones and unmanned systems in defense and security applications. An important aspect of this collaboration is the planned integration of Safe Pro’s SPOTD algorithms and Lantronix’s hardware into existing U.S. Army drone and command platforms, directly embedding...

title: A Prompt Too Far: How AI Advice On HIV Prevention Turned Life-Threatening For Delhi Man
description: The man allegedly followed a regimen suggested by the chatbot, which included an incorrect and aggressive dosage of antiretroviral drugs
